metadata.dc:author: Nieto, J A
Iturriaga, R
Gracia, R
Barrio, R
Lama, R
Lledó, G
Nistal, M
metadata.dc:description: One case of bilateral "in situ" gonadoblastoma associated with aniridia and Smith-Lemli-Opitz syndrom is reported. This observation confirms the incidence of gonadoblastoma in intersex patients. Coincidence of this tumor and aniridia is considered by the authors as previously unreported.
metadata.dc:title: Asociación de aniridia con tumor embrionario no renal (gonadoblastoma) en niño con síndrome de Smith-Lemli-Opitz
[Aniridia associated with gonadoblastoma in Smith-Lemli-Opitz syndrome (author's transl)].
